articles.content:
(CNN) US airline passengers who figured face mask enforcements had more bark than bite could end up getting bit later this week.

articles.description: Rayshard Brooks' widow, Tomika Miller, shares details from the last moments she spent with Brooks, saying she "wouldn't change that day for anything other than my husband not coming home."

articles.description: Technology giant Tencent has unveiled plans for an almost entirely car-free "city of the future," equivalent in size to Monaco, in the Chinese metropolis of Shenzhen.

articles.title: Resident: Not much change a century after Black Wall Street
articles.description: A 2018 Human Rights Watch report finds that black residents in Tulsa, Oklahoma, are more than twice as likely to be arrested than white residents. CNN's Abby Phillip looks back at Tulsa's racial tension history ahead of President Trump's rally in the city.

articles.title: Red Cross to begin testing donor blood for Covid-19 antibodies
articles.description: The American Red Cross will now test all blood, plasma and platelet donations for Covid-19 antibodies, the organization said Monday.

articles.title: 911 call released in police killing of Rayshard Brooks
